body:
Hey, some of you may know that I am a youtuber and I have started uploading PvP montages! But I'm getting a little bored if my intro, so I'm asking you to make me a Cinema 4D unique intro template. The intro song must NOT include swearing and it must be not be copyrighted. Your name/IGN/YouTube channel name/link will be put in the descriptions of my videos.

Go and check out my channel here:

https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCxhnBafIT_7EZYL8IbGRTTw

Great thanks!

~ Galrandir
